item.description: Join us as we discuss and put into action our goal of spreading freedom in Connecticut. Ron Paul's 2012 presidential campaign has reignited the fires of liberty in the Constitution State and we plan to carry that momentum into ongoing projects. Some of the ideas we're exploring include locating and supporting ideal local liberty candidates, organizing to oppose legislation (e.g. CT internet tax) readiness / prepper meetups, a group firearm permit class, CT4L Dime Cards, video production (TV and internet), group road trips (e.g. Porcupine Freedom Festival in NH) and much more. Please come out and contribute your thoughts and ideas into the mix. Our meetup members come from various social, religious and political backgrounds; everyone is invited to participate as long as you respect personal liberty.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the tables to the right in the back.
item.name: CT4Liberty Social & Organizational Meetup
